mapper.select: SELECT br.id, any_value(br.role_code) roleCode, any_value(br.role_name) roleName, any_value(br.description) description, any_value(br.created_time) createdTime, any_value(br.updated_time) updatedTime, any_value(GROUP_CONCAT(bp.id)) permission, any_value(GROUP_CONCAT(bp.per_name)) permissionName FROM buir_role br LEFT JOIN buir_role_permission brp ON br.id = brp.role_id LEFT JOIN buir_permission bp ON brp.permission_id = bp.id WHERE br.id = #{id}
